授業目的:
The objectives of this course are:
1. To develop students’ TOEIC listening skills
2. To develop students’ TOEIC reading skills
3. To help students build their vocabulary knowledge
4. To help students improve their overall test-taking strategies
5. To help students become aware of common distractors
6. To help students better understand English as it is used in everyday work and life situations
到達目標:
1. Students will develop their listening and reading skills.
2. Students will strengthen their vocabulary knowledge.
3. Students will become better test-takers, carefully attentive to common distractors.
4. Students will familiarize themselves with natural English.
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ですので、60単位を超えて卒業に必要な単位として算入することができません（60単位までしか算入できない）。ただし、本授業科目が卒業に必要な単位として算入できない科目の場合は、たとえオンライン授業であっても“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”とはなりません。
The course is subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses and cannot be included as part of the credits required for graduation beyond 60 credits (only up to 60 credits can be counted). However, if the course is originally not credited toward graduation, it will not be determined as subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses, regardless of the online format.
授業方法:
1. Please read the attached file below - Practical English A2 - Online Guidelines - Tactics for TOEIC - Spring 2022.
2. This course will be conducted in English only and English will be the means of communication between the students and the instructor. (Students will also be expected to communicate with one another in English.)
3. Students are encouraged to actively participate in class, both independently and collaboratively, in order to enhance their competence and confidence in English and also to create a better learning environment for all.
